title: More Ukrainian evacuees leave ruined Mariupol as EU targets Russian oil, banks
content:
1. More Ukrainian evacuees leave ruined Mariupol as EU targets Russian oil, banks  Reuters
  2. Ukrainian fighters say Russian forces have begun storming a steel plant in Mariupol  KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
  3. May 3, 2022 Russia-Ukraine news: Live updates  CNN
  4. UN confirms evacuations of 100 Ukrainians from besieged Mariupol plant - BBC News  BBC News
  5. Your Tuesday Briefing  The New York Times

localize.title: EUがロシアの石油や銀行を標的にする中、廃墟と化したマリウポルを離れるウクライナ人避難民がさらに増加
欧盟针对俄罗斯石油和银行，更多乌克兰撤离人员离开被毁坏的马里乌波尔
歐盟針對俄羅斯石油和銀行，更多烏克蘭撤離人員離開被毀壞的馬裏烏波爾
